scenario_text.value: We’re almost there now.

It’s unknown territory from here on in.
Do what I say everyone, got it?
Hey! I said, “Got it”?!
Sirrr, yes sirrr...
Man, what a pain...
Saki...!

Hey! How dare you say that to me?! That’s no
way to speak to someone older than you!
If you’re older, then friggin’ act like it...
Excuse me?!

Stop blowin’ your top over every little
thing. Pain in the neck...
Pain in the...?! I’m only saying the truth!

All you’ve done is say things to divide us!
Now of all times, we need to stick together—

I’m the one “dividing” us?! Take a look in
the mirror! Can’t you see what you’re doing?!
What, why youuu...!

Oooo, we got a fight on our hands, here?
C’mon, y’all, place your bets!
Hey, now! Don’t encourage them!
Oh my, this is kinda bad, isn’t it?

Jeepers! Hey Takuma, you gotta stop those
two!
Yeah I know, it’s just...

(Shuuji has clearly lost his cool. I have to
calm him down so he listens to reason.)

(Hmm, or maybe I should let them fight it out
and clear the air?)

(Then again, if I don’t get Kaito to calm
down, I doubt it’ll get settled here...)
(So, what should I do?)
Get them to listen.
Let them fight!
Let Miu handle this.

Shuuji, could you calm down and listen a bit
more to what everyone’s saying?

I haven’t done anything wrong! It’s you guys
who’re in the wrong here!

No one’s listening to me, why the heck should
I listen to what any of you have to say?!
Uh, Shuuji, I don’t think that’s...
*sigh*... He’s the worst.
I can’t even talk to this guy.

All right, you two. Just say what you want to
say.

If you’ve got something to complain about,
let it all out. You’ll feel better.

Oh... But what if it escalates to physical
violence?
Who cares? I ain’t got nothing to say.
Hey! I’m not finished talking!
This is just a waste of time.
You’re up, Miu.
Huh? Me?

You just handle Kaito, okay? You can leave
Shuuji to me.
Hey, you leave Miu out of this.

All right, already. No need to glare like
that. Now’s not the time to fight, is it?
But I ain’t trying to...
*sigh*... Man, this is so stupid.

Let’s go, already. The sun’ll set before we
get there, at this rate.

Wha’?
Hey, you! Don’t just go off on your own!
Damn... Why are all of you...?
Ah, Shuuji! Wait up!
Ho ho ho...
